application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
site_name: Manor Road Sports And Social Club
description: Application for prior approval telecommunication: Proposed installation of a 20m high slimline lattice tower to support 6No. antenna apertures and 4No. 600mm dishes, along with 5No. equipment cabinets and development ancillary
decision_conditions:
The proposal, by reason of scale, mass, height, design and siting within playing fields and Green Belt, adjacent to a Site of Importance for Nature Conservation and in close proximity to residential dwellings, would be a visually discordant and obtrusive feature which would harm the character and appearance, including the openness, of the area. The proposal is therefore contrary to the following policies:National Planning Policy Framework (December 2023)Policies D4 and SI 6 of the London Plan (March 2021)Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework Core Strategy (July 2010)Policies BP11 and BC12 of the Local Development Framework Borough Wide Development Plan Document (March 2011)Policies SP2, DMD 1, and DMSI 9 of the London Borough of Barking and
Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)
